references.paper_title: GPyTorch: Blackbox Matrix-matrix Gaussian Process Inference with GPU Acceleration
references.reason: This paper introduces GPyTorch, a library used for the experiments in this paper, making it a crucial foundational reference.

references.paper_title: Sampling from Gaussian Process Posteriors using Stochastic Gradient Descent
references.reason: This paper introduces a key method used for the experiments which is extended upon in this paper, thereby making it a highly important reference.

references.paper_title: Stochastic Gradient Descent for Gaussian Processes Done Right
references.reason: This paper introduces another key method used for the experiments which is extended upon in this paper, thereby making it a highly important reference.
This is a foundational textbook in the field of Gaussian processes, providing a comprehensive overview of the subject matter.

references.paper_title: Efficiently Sampling Functions from Gaussian Process Posteriors
references.reason: This paper introduces pathwise conditioning, a technique that is directly relevant to the pathwise estimator proposed in this paper.
